p: In the world millions of people are afflicted by oral diseases [ 32] through biofilm development [ 33]. If preventive or curative measures are not undertaken against oral pathogens, systemic or chronic diseases such as diabetes, osteoporosis, rheumatoid arthritis and coronary heart disease may result [ 33]. The number of oral bacteria in healthy individuals is in the range 10 2–10 3, 10 4–10 8 in a gingival state and 10 5–10 8 in a periodontal state [ 34].
